await contract.deploymentTransaction();
const contract = await ethers.getContractAt("LumashyReward", "0xAd9C2562675753F197a5307D27d8aa42020956Fe");
await contract.deploymentTransaction();
const contract = await ethers.getContractAt("LumashyReward", "0xAd9C2562675753F197a5307D27d8aa42020956Fe");
await contract.deploymentTransaction();
const contract = await ethers.getContractAt("LumashyReward", "0xAd9C2562675753F197a5307D27d8aa42020956Fe");
